original_text:
Golden Genie
Creata da Nolimit City, Golden Genie è una slot a 5 rulli e 20 paylines, con 3 funzioni. Queste includono simboli che si trasformano in wilds e forniscono una spinta moltiplicatrice, stacked wilds con vincita in entrambi i modi paga e gioco bonus dove ogni simbolo walking wild che appare aumenta un moltiplicatore di 1x. Aladdin potrebbe realizzare i Suoi desideri di jackpot? Scopritelo nella nostra recensione dettagliata di Golden Genie .
I Genie sono famosi per esaudire i desideri di coloro che hanno la fortuna di trovare le lanterne magiche che chiamano casa. Con la slot machine Golden Genie, chiunque sia alla ricerca di simboli moltiplicatori selvaggi, simboli selvaggi di tipo Stacked e icone vaganti avrà tutti e tre i desideri che si avverano.
È un gioco a cinque rulli e 20 linee con protagonista il bel Aladdin, la bella Jasmine e il potente Genio. La slot online Golden Genie funziona su desktop e mobile e porta un tocco di magia ai casinò con la gamma Nolimit City.
Una grafica da genio della lampada
Questo non è il primo gioco basato sulla storia di un ragazzo orfano e della sua lampada magica, e siamo sicuri che non sarà l’ultimo. La griglia di simboli con cornice dorata si trova su uno sfondo di cielo stellato, e l’orientamento verticale di ogni simbolo aiuta il gioco ad adattarsi agli schermi di smartphone e tablet.
Se l’uso delle icone delle carte da gioco sia una cosa buona o cattiva è una questione di opinione, ma fanno poco per aggiungere al tema magico della slot machine Golden Genie. Un cobra e un leopardo sono premi di medio livello, e anche se il leopardo non si adatta alla storia, il gioco ha un bell’aspetto, quindi non ci lamenteremo.
I tre personaggi principali, presentati ciascuno in uno stile dettagliato ma cartoonish, restituiscono i premi più alti. Fa parte di una gamma relativamente piccola, ma molto popolare, dello sviluppatore svedese Nolimit City.
Il design è semplice ma di classe nella slot Golden Genie. Basato sul classico racconto popolare di Aladino e della lampada magica. Con un cielo notturno pieno di stelle sullo sfondo, la grafica è colorata e ad alta definizione. Le immagini audaci hanno un aspetto da cartone animato televisivo. Sono ben fatti.
Sulle bobine si vedono da A a 10 reali accanto a un leopardo, una pantera, una lampada, Aladdin e una donna. Questa donna misteriosa è il simbolo standard superiore, che assegna 1, 3,75 o 25 volte la vostra puntata totale se atterrate 3, 4 o 5 su una linea di pagamento.
Il genio è il selvaggio e disperso. Sostituisce quindi tutti i simboli per creare combinazioni vincenti. Il simbolo di genio offre anche sovvenzioni fino a 25x la Sua posta in gioco totale per linea di pagamento
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Non c’è bisogno di strofinare una lampada per sbloccare la magia. Basta far girare i rulli e guardare fuori per il Genio. È un simbolo selvaggio, che si comporta come gli altri per completare una sequenza vincente, ed è anche l’elemento scatenante di una speciale funzione di Genie Parade.
Ci vogliono almeno tre simboli del Genio in vista, oppure potete imbrogliare un po’ e lanciare la funzione con una puntata bonus di 80 volte la vostra puntata. Sembra molto, ma lo sono anche le potenziali vincite di questa funzione della slot online Golden Genie.
Tutti i Geni si bloccano in posizione, e uno dei simboli di attivazione diventa un Genio d’Oro. Il resto delle bobine si respira, mentre tutti i Geni spostano una bobina a sinistra. Questo continua con il Golden Genie aumentando un moltiplicatore in ogni respin. Se va fuori campo e altri simboli scatenanti sono ancora sulle bobine, il moltiplicatore accumulato viene trasferito al Genio più vicino.
Con un po’ di fortuna, la Genie Parade corre e corre, mentre altri appaiono in respin e i moltiplicatori continuano ad aumentare.
Non è l’unico bonus della slot machine Golden Genie. La funzione Genie Lamps, premiata a caso, vede due e quattro bobine riempirsi di lampade selvagge di tipo Stacked. Ogni nuova combinazione vincente viene calcolata, e il gioco paga sia dal lato sinistro che destro.
La funzione Genie Wishes si attiva se Aladdin atterra nell’immediata sinistra della lampada in qualsiasi rotazione. Tutti gli esempi di entrambi i simboli diventano extra wild e moltiplicano le vincite per 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, o 10x.
Se vi piacciono le slot a tema magico e i bonus incantevoli, allora amerete la slot online Golden Genie. La grafica non è nulla di rivoluzionario, ma ci siamo certamente divertiti a giocare, soprattutto quando si sono scatenati i preziosi giri bonus.
Le bobine con i simboli moltiplicatori wild possono portare alcuni grandi premi, e le caratteristiche in gioco sono quasi sicuramente in grado di creare una o due combo vincenti. Se state pensando di prendere l’opzione della scommessa bonus, vale la pena sapere che l’RTP durante la Genie Parade sale al 96,36%.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Anche la slot Aladdin and the Sorcerer di Pragmatic Play è un gioco a cinque rulli e 20 linee. È caratterizzato da simboli wild di tipo Stacked e respingi bobina, dove i due personaggi principali si attaccano l’un l’altro. Se Aladdin vince, altri premi nel round vengono triplicati.
Genie Wild, invece, è una slot di NextGen Gaming con grafica da cartone animato. Il Genio femminile è un simbolo wild, e durante un round di giochi gratuiti, si espande attraverso i rulli per aiutarti a vincere premi extra.

raw_translation.response:
Golden Genie

Created by Nolimit City, Golden Genie is a 5-reel, 20-payline slot with 3 functions. These include symbols that transform into wilds and provide a multiplier boost, stacked wilds with wins paying both ways, and a bonus game where each walking wild symbol that appears increases a 1x multiplier. Will Aladdin realize his jackpot wishes? Find out in our in-depth review of Golden Genie.

Genies are famous for granting the wishes of those lucky enough to find the magic lamps they call home. With the Golden Genie slot machine, anyone looking for multiplier wild symbols, stacked wilds, and wandering icons will have all three wishes come true.

This is a five-reel, 20-line game featuring the handsome Aladdin, the beautiful Jasmine, and the powerful Genie. The Golden Genie online slot works on both desktop and mobile and brings a touch of magic to casinos with the Nolimit City range.

A genie-like design

This is not the first game based on the story of an orphaned boy and his magical lamp, and we're sure it won't be the last. The grid of symbols with a golden frame is located on a starry sky background, and the vertical orientation of each symbol helps the game fit on smartphone and tablet screens.

Whether the use of playing card icons is a good or bad thing is a matter of opinion, but they do little to add to the magical theme of the Golden Genie slot machine. A cobra and a leopard are medium-level prizes, and although the leopard doesn't fit the story, the game looks good, so we won't complain.

The three main characters, each presented in a detailed but cartoonish style, offer the highest prizes. It's part of a relatively small but very popular range from Swedish developer Nolimit City.

The design is simple but classy in the Golden Genie slot. Based on the classic folk tale of Aladdin and the magic lamp. With a starry night sky in the background, the graphics are colorful and high definition. The bold images have a TV cartoon look. They are well-made.

On the reels, you'll see real A to 10 next to a leopard, panther, lamp, Aladdin, and a woman. This mysterious woman is the top standard symbol, awarding 1, 3.75, or 25 times your total bet if you land 3, 4 or 5 on a payline.

The genie is the wild and scatter symbol. It replaces all symbols to create winning combinations. The genie symbol also grants up to 25x your total stake per payline.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

No need to rub a lamp to unlock the magic. Just spin the reels and watch out for the Genie. It's a wild symbol, behaving like others to complete a winning sequence, and it's also the trigger for a special Genie Parade feature.

You need at least three Genie symbols in sight, or you can cheat a little and trigger the feature with a bonus bet of 80 times your bet. It sounds like a lot, but so are the potential winnings of this Golden Genie online slot feature.

All Genies lock in place, and one of the triggering symbols becomes a Golden Genie. The rest of the reels take a breath as all Genies move one reel to the left. This continues with the Golden Genie increasing a multiplier with each respin. If it goes off-screen and other triggering symbols are still on the reels, the accumulated multiplier is transferred to the nearest Genie.

With a bit of luck, the Genie Parade runs and runs as others appear in respins and multipliers continue to rise.

It's not the only bonus in the Golden Genie slot machine. The Genie Lamps feature, randomly awarded, sees two and four reels fill with stacked wild lamps. Each new winning combination is calculated, and the game pays from both the left and right sides.

The Genie Wishes feature is triggered if Aladdin lands on the immediate left of the lamp on any spin. All examples of both symbols become extra wilds and multiply wins by 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, or 10x.

If you like magical themed slots and enchanting bonuses, you'll love the Golden Genie online slot. The graphics are nothing revolutionary, but we certainly had fun playing it, especially when the precious bonus spins were triggered.

Reels with multiplier wild symbols can bring in some big prizes, and the in-game features are almost certainly capable of creating one or two winning combos. If you're thinking of taking the bonus bet option, it's worth knowing that the RTP during the Genie Parade rises to 96.36%.

Similar Slot Machines

Pragmatic Play's Aladdin and the Sorcerer slot is also a five-reel, 20-line game. It features stacked wild symbols and reel respins, where the two main characters attach to each other. If Aladdin wins, other prizes in the round are tripled.

Genie Wild, on the other hand, is a NextGen Gaming slot with cartoonish graphics. The female genie is a wild symbol, and during a round of free games, it expands across the reels to help you win extra prizes.

Golden Genie, created by Nolimit City, is a 5-reel, 20-payline slot with 3 features. These include symbols that transform into wilds and provide a multiplier boost, stacked wilds with both ways pays, and a bonus game where each walking wild symbol increases a 1x multiplier. Can Aladdin make His jackpot wishes come true? Find out in our detailed review of Golden Genie.
The Genie is famous for granting the wishes of those lucky enough to find the magic lamps they call home. With the Golden Genie slot machine, anyone looking for multiplying wild symbols, stacked wild symbols, and wandering icons will have all three wishes granted.
It's a five-reel, 20-line game featuring handsome Aladdin, beautiful Jasmine, and powerful Genie. The online Golden Genie slot works on desktop and mobile and brings a touch of magic to casinos with the Nolimit City range.
Genie-themed graphics
This isn't the first game based on the story of an orphan boy and his magic lamp, and we're sure it won't be the last. The golden-framed symbol grid sits against a starry sky background, and the vertical orientation of each symbol helps the game adapt to smartphone and tablet screens.
Whether using playing card icons on a slot game is a good or bad thing is a matter of opinion, but they do little to add to the magical theme of the Golden Genie slot machine. A cobra and a leopard are mid-level prizes, and although the leopard doesn't fit the story, the game looks good, so we won't complain.
The three main characters, each presented in a detailed but cartoonish style, offer the highest prizes. It's part of a relatively small but popular range from Swedish developer Nolimit City.
The design is simple but classy in the Golden Genie slot. Based on the classic folk tale of Aladdin and the magic lamp. With a starry night sky background, the graphics are colorful and sharp. The bold images have a TV cartoon look about them. They're well done.
On the reels, you'll see A to 10 royals alongside a leopard, a panther, a lamp, Aladdin, and a woman. This mysterious woman is the top standard symbol, awarding 1, 3.75, or 25 times your total bet if you land 3, 4, or 5 on a payline.
The Genie is the wild and scatter. It therefore replaces all symbols to create winning combinations. The genie symbol also grants up to 25x your total bet per payline.
Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
There's no need to rub a lamp to unlock the magic. Just spin the reels and watch out for the Genie. It's a wild symbol, behaving like others to complete a winning sequence, and it's also the trigger element of a special Genie Parade feature.
You need at least three Genie symbols in view, or you can cheat a little and launch the feature with a bonus bet of 80 times your bet. It sounds like a lot, but so are the potential wins from this Golden Genie online slot feature.
All Genies lock in position, and one of the triggering symbols becomes a Gold Genie. The rest of the reels respin as all Genies move one reel to the left. This continues, with the Golden Genie increasing a multiplier on each respin. If it goes off-screen and other triggering symbols are still on the reels, the accumulated multiplier transfers to the nearest Genie.
With a bit of luck, the Genie Parade runs and runs, with others appearing in respins and multipliers continuing to rise.
It's not the only bonus in the Golden Genie slot machine. The Genie Lamps feature, randomly awarded, sees two and four reels filling with stacked wild lamps. Each new winning combination is calculated, and the game pays both left and right.
The Genie Wishes feature is triggered if Aladdin lands immediately to the left of the lamp in any spin. All instances of both symbols become extra wilds and multiply wins by 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, or 10x.
If you like magical themed slots and enchanting bonuses, then you'll love the Golden Genie online slot. The graphics aren't revolutionary, but we certainly had fun playing, especially when the precious bonus spins were triggered.
Reels with multiplying wild symbols can bring some big prizes, and the in-game features are almost certainly capable of creating one or two winning combos. If you're thinking of taking the bonus bet option, it's worth knowing that the RTP during the Genie Parade rises to 96.36%.

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Golden Genie is a 5-reel, 20-payline slot that features wild and scatter symbols, stacked wilds, and multiple bonus features that are both fun and potentially profitable.

Wild and Scatter Symbol

The Genie symbol is both a wild and scatter symbol in Golden Genie. It can substitute for all other symbols to create winning combinations and can award up to 25x your total stake per payline.

Genie Parade Feature

The Genie Parade feature in Golden Genie is triggered by landing three or more Genie symbols on the reels. All Genies lock in place, and one of the triggering symbols becomes a Golden Genie. The rest of the reels take a breath as all Genies move one reel to the left. This continues with the Golden Genie increasing a multiplier with each respin. If it goes off-screen and other triggering symbols are still on the reels, the accumulated multiplier is transferred to the nearest Genie.

Genie Lamps Feature

The Genie Lamps feature is randomly triggered in Golden Genie, and it sees two and four reels fill with stacked wild lamps that pay from both the left and right sides. Each new winning combination is calculated, and the game pays from both the left and right sides.

Genie Wishes Feature

The Genie Wishes feature in Golden Genie is triggered if Aladdin lands on the immediate left of the lamp on any spin. All examples of both symbols become extra wilds and multiply wins by 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, or 10x.

Design and Graphics

Golden Genie has a well-made design that is simple but classy. The graphics are colorful and high definition, with a starry night sky background. The images look like they have a TV cartoon look.

Storyline and Theme

Golden Genie is based on the classic folk tale of Aladdin and the magic lamp. The game features the characters Aladdin, Jasmine, and the powerful Genie, and follows the story of uncovering the magic of the Golden Genie.

Payouts and Winnings

In Golden Genie, the top standard symbol is the mysterious woman, which awards 1, 3.75, or 25 times your total bet if you land 3, 4 or 5 on a payline. The game's bonus features can bring in some big prizes, and the RTP during the Genie Parade rises to 96.36%.
